## load mtcars

```{r}
data(mtcars)
```

##loading ggplot2
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(mtcars, aes(x=hp, y=mpg)) +
  geom_point(aes(size=cyl))
  
```

# Load MASS package

```{r}
library(MASS)
data("whiteside")
```

## Plot Gas vs. Temp
```{r}

plot(whiteside$Temp, whiteside$Gas, 
     xlab = "Outside temperature", 
     ylab = "Heating gas consumption")
```

# Plot whiteside data
```{r}
plot(whiteside)
```
# Apply the plot() function to Insul
```{r}
plot(whiteside$Insul)
```
